languages.text: {n}Где-то перед вами парит цветастое пятно с прозрачной бутылью вместо живота. Он потешно шевелит щупальцами, а из его рта вываливаются звуки:{/n} "Горд кафтан? Сны на грядке?"

{n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"
languages.original_text: {n}Где-то перед вами парит цветастое пятно с прозрачной бутылью вместо живота. Он потешно шевелит щупальцами, а из его рта вываливаются звуки:{/n} "Горд кафтан? Сны на грядке?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A colourful blob with a large bottle in its gut floats in front of you. The blob wags its tentacles comically, and a few sounds roll out of its mouth:{/n} "Do we fight the bored button? Or brew the sunset?"

{n}A colourful blob with a large bottle in its gut floats in front of you. The blob wags its tentacles comically, and a few sounds roll out of its mouth:{/n} "Do we fight the bored button? Or brew the sunset?"

{n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

{n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

{n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

{n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

languages.text: {n}Une silhouette informe et colorée flotte devant vous. Son ventre ressemble à une grosse bouteille et elle agite ses tentacules d'une manière comique en essayant de s'exprimer.{/n} « Aborder la cabine ? Mise à feu de l'équipage ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une silhouette informe et colorée flotte devant vous. Son ventre ressemble à une grosse bouteille et elle agite ses tentacules d'une manière comique en essayant de s'exprimer.{/n} « Aborder la cabine ? Mise à feu de l'équipage ? »

languages.text: {n}Una masa informe y colorida flota frente a ti. Tiene una botella alargada a la altura de la barriga y mueve sus tentáculos de forma cómica mientras intenta hablar.{/n} «¿Por la mitad? ¿En contra de él?».
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una masa informe y colorida flota frente a ti. Tiene una botella alargada a la altura de la barriga y mueve sus tentáculos de forma cómica mientras intenta hablar.{/n} «¿Por la mitad? ¿En contra de él?».

languages.text: {n}某个五彩斑斓的斑点漂浮在你面前，它的肚子看起来像是个大瓶子。它一边滑稽地扭动着触手，一边对你开了口。{/n}“箭长……打人？泥干爵怎么痒了？”
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

traits.locale_text: {n}某个五彩斑斓的斑点漂浮在你面前，它的肚子看起来像是个大瓶子。它一边滑稽地扭动着触手，一边对你开了口。{/n}“箭长……打人？泥干爵怎么痒了？”

languages.text: {n}あなたの前でカラフルな塊が浮いている。腹のあるべき場所に大きな瓶があり、触手をコミカルに動かして話そうとしている。{/n}「船室？スタークルーに点火？」
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの前でカラフルな塊が浮いている。腹のあるべき場所に大きな瓶があり、触手をコミカルに動かして話そうとしている。{/n}「船室？スタークルーに点火？」

languages.text: {n}Ein bunter Blob schwebt vor dir in der Luft. Dort, wo sein Bauch sein sollte, hat er stattdessen eine große Flasche, und er bewegt seine Tentakel auf äußerst komische Weise, während er zu sprechen versucht.{/n} "Alle an Bord? Sternencrew Zündung?"
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein bunter Blob schwebt vor dir in der Luft. Dort, wo sein Bauch sein sollte, hat er stattdessen eine große Flasche, und er bewegt seine Tentakel auf äußerst komische Weise, während er zu sprechen versucht.{/n} "Alle an Bord? Sternencrew Zündung?"

languages.text: {n}Önünde renkli bir kütle uçuyor. Karnının olması gereken yerde büyük bir şişe var ve konuşmaya çalışırken dokunaçlarını komik komik sallıyor.{/n} "Kabini bordalayın mı? Yıldız tayfası yakılsın mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}A colourful blob floats in front of you. It has a large bottle where its belly should be, and moves its tentacles around in a comical manner as it tries to speak.{/n} "Board cabin? Star crew ignite?"
